DataElement.preferredName: Patient To Treating Healthcare Facility Driving Distance And Time Amount Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text describing the driving distance and time required to travel from the patient location to the treating hospital/facility.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient To Treating Healthcare Facility Driving Distance And Time Amount
